propertyDescriptions.title: The main title of the Dataset
propertyDescriptions.subtitle: A secondary title that amplifies or states certain limitations on the main title
propertyDescriptions.alternativeTitle: Either 1) a title commonly used to refer to the Dataset or 2) an abbreviation of the main title
propertyDescriptions.alternativeURL: Another URL where one can view or access the data in the Dataset, e.g. a project or personal webpage
propertyDescriptions.otherId: Another unique identifier for the Dataset (e.g. producer's or another repository's identifier)
propertyDescriptions.author: The entity, e.g. a person or organization, that created the Dataset
propertyDescriptions.datasetContact: The entity, e.g. a person or organization, that users of the Dataset can contact with questions
propertyDescriptions.dsDescription: A summary describing the purpose, nature, and scope of the Dataset
propertyDescriptions.subject: The area of study relevant to the Dataset
propertyDescriptions.keyword: A key term that describes an important aspect of the Dataset and information about any controlled vocabulary used
propertyDescriptions.topicClassification: Indicates a broad, important topic or subject that the Dataset covers and information about any controlled vocabulary used
propertyDescriptions.publication: The article or report that uses the data in the Dataset. The full list of related publications will be displayed on the metadata tab
propertyDescriptions.language: A language that the Dataset's files is written in
propertyDescriptions.producer: The entity, such a person or organization, managing the finances or other administrative processes involved in the creation of the Dataset
propertyDescriptions.productionDate: The date when the data were produced (not distributed, published, or archived)
propertyDescriptions.productionPlace: The location where the data and any related materials were produced or collected
propertyDescriptions.contributor: The entity, such as a person or organization, responsible for collecting, managing, or otherwise contributing to the development of the Dataset
propertyDescriptions.grantNumber: Information about the Dataset's financial support
propertyDescriptions.distributor: The entity, such as a person or organization, designated to generate copies of the Dataset, including any editions or revisions
propertyDescriptions.distributionDate: The date when the Dataset was made available for distribution/presentation
propertyDescriptions.depositor: The entity, such as a person or organization, that deposited the Dataset in the repository
propertyDescriptions.dateOfDeposit: The date when the Dataset was deposited into the repository
propertyDescriptions.timePeriodCovered: The time period that the data refer to. Also known as span. This is the time period covered by the data, not the dates of coding, collecting data, or making documents machine-readable
propertyDescriptions.dateOfCollection: The dates when the data were collected or generated
propertyDescriptions.kindOfData: The type of data included in the files (e.g. survey data, clinical data, or machine-readable text)
propertyDescriptions.series: Information about the dataset series to which the Dataset belong
propertyDescriptions.software: Information about the software used to generate the Dataset
propertyDescriptions.relatedMaterial: Information, such as a persistent ID or citation, about the material related to the Dataset, such as appendices or sampling information available outside of the Dataset
propertyDescriptions.relatedDatasets: Information, such as a persistent ID or citation, about a related dataset, such as previous research on the Dataset's subject
propertyDescriptions.otherReferences: Information, such as a persistent ID or citation, about another type of resource that provides background or supporting material to the Dataset
propertyDescriptions.dataSources: Information, such as a persistent ID or citation, about sources of the Dataset (e.g. a book, article, serial, or machine-readable data file)
propertyDescriptions.originOfSources: For historical sources, the origin and any rules followed in establishing them as sources
propertyDescriptions.accessToSources: 1) Methods or procedures for accessing data sources and 2) any special permissions needed for access

Szókészlet felhasználható. A szókészlet paraméter használható a szókészlet megadására, mint LCSH, MeSH, vagy egyebek. A szókészlet URL paraméterben megadható a szókészlet elérési útja.
